Description: For your consideration is a great playing Gibson SG Special LTD in Blue Mist Mahogany Body./ Mahogany Neck . Guitar is light and well balanced (especially for a Gibson) and weighs in at 6lbs 13oz. This is an awesome sounding and playing guitar that would be a great addition to the arsenal of a player who doesn't mind some finish imperfections. - Guitar was outfitted with push/pull coil taps for both the neck and bridge pickups which sound amazing and open up a whole new world of tones for the 490R/490T pickups. Neck is straight as an arrow and the action is great - plays as a Gibson should - In terms of playability; I do recommend new strings and a setup as they strings were not installed very well. - There are a couple chips in the finish and some scratches from a pick evident on the body, I highlighted these in the photos. - Paint is chipping away where the fret board meets the neck on a couple spots on the bass side of the neck and more prevalent on the treble side. See photos. This is typical of Gibson paint job of this era. (see the last two pictures). - Some of the side dot inlays have some plastic remaining on them Includes Gibson USA Gigbag which is nicely lined! Buy it now for Free SHIPPING! A rare edition of one rock's most revered electric guitars.With a shocking blue mist finish, the SG Special Ltd. electric guitar will turn heads everywhere. The Original Gibson SG shattered all perceptions of what a guitar should be when it was 1st introduced in 1961. Today, the SG stands as one of Gibson's most popular and best selling guitars. Its distinctive twin cutaways, pointed horns, and beveled edges have made it one of the most inspired and iconic designs in the history of guitar making. The versatile Gibson Special offers the best combination of features and value in the Gibson line, with its streamlined, solid and lightweight mahogany body, and traditional 22-fret mahogany neck, dot inlays, and "C" neck profile. Add a pair of Gibson's 490R/490T Alnico magnet pickups” packed with traditional humbucker tone and enhanced highs” and you've got yourself one affordable, powerhouse SG.FEATURESBody Style: SG Double CutawayBody: Solid MahoganyNeck: Set MahoganyNeck Profile: C ShapePeghead Pitch: 17 DegreesNeck Joint Location: 19th FretFingerboard: EbonyScale Length: 24-3/4"No. Of Frets: 22Nut Width: 1.69"Radius: 12"Inlays: Dots On Neck, Gibson Logo On HeadstockHardware: ChromeTailpiece: StopbarBridge: Tune-O-MaticKnobs: Black Top Hat With Silver InsertsTuners: ChromeNeck Pickup: 490rBridge Pickup: 490tControls: Two Volume, Two Tone, 3-Way Toggle Pickup SelectorFinish: LacquerCase: Hardshell
Title: 2008 Gibson USA SG Special Blue mist Limited Edition Ebony Fingerboard COIL TAP
ConditionDescription: Guitar perform exceptionally - some paint chipping where the fretboard meets the neck, scratches and dings throughout. Coil Tap added to both pickups
